Tool

NameRank Filter
ID9
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2010
Specificationgrid

Description

Rank filter for grids. Set rank to fifty percent to apply a median filter.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grid Grid (input)INPUT
Output
Filtered Grid (*)Grid (optional output)RESULT
Options
Search ModeChoiceMODEAvailable Choices: [0] Square [1] Circle Default: 1
RadiusIntegerRADIUSMinimum: 1 Default: 1
Rank [Percent]Floating pointRANKMinimum: 0.000000 Maximum: 100.000000 Default: 50.000000
(*) optional
